Package org.xmlcml.cml.tools

Class Summary
AbstractTool is this used?
AtomMatcher manages information for matching atoms.
AtomPair represents a set of atoms.
AtomSetTool tool to support atom set.
AtomTool additional tools for atom.
AtomTree An atom-centered tree.
BondSetTool tool to support bond set.
BondTool additional tools for bond.
CatalogTool simple catalog for CML.
ConnectionTableTool tool to support connection table.
Contact tool for managing contacts doe NOT recalculate as it is easy to lose context
CrystalTool tool for managing crystals
DisorderAssembly based on IUCr Core CIF dictionary atom_site_disorder_assembly _name _atom_site_disorder_assembly _category atom_site _type char _list yes _list_reference _atom_site_label _example _detail A disordered methyl assembly with groups 1 and 2 B disordered sites related by a mirror S disordered sites independent of symmetry _definition A code which identifies a cluster of atoms that show long-range positional disorder but are locally ordered.
DisorderGroup based on IUCr Core CIF dictionary atom_site_disorder_group _name _atom_site_disorder_group _category atom_site _type char _list yes _list_reference _atom_site_label _example _detail 1 unique disordered site in group 1 2 unique disordered site in group 2 -1 symmetry-independent disordered site _definition A code which identifies a group of positionally disordered atom sites that are locally simultaneously occupied.
ElementTool tool for managing crystals
FragmentTool additional tools for fragment.
GeometryTool additional tools for geometry.
InlineMolecule create molecule from inline representation of the atoms and bonds.
MapTool additional tools for bond.
MoleculeTool additional tools for molecule.
Morgan class to apply Morgan algorithm.
OscarTool tool to support reactions.
OscarToolTest  
PiSystem manage counting and management of double bonding.
PiSystemManager manage counting and management of double bonding.
PolymerTool tool to support polymer building.
ReactionTool too to support reactions.
StereochemistryTool tool to manage stereochemistry.
 

Enum Summary
AtomMatcher.Strategy  
InlineMolecule.Error error messages.
InlineMolecule.State states of parse.
MoleculeTool.ProcessDisorderControl control operations for removing disorder.
MoleculeTool.RemoveDisorderControl control operations for removing disorder.
Morgan.Algorithm decides on type of algorithm.
Morgan.Annotation annotation for atoms.
PolymerTool.Convention polymer conventions.
